mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, name, id_card, user_name, user_sex, user_password, user_email, user_mobile, user_register_time, user_register_ip) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{username}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{registerTime}, #{registerip})
mapper.update: update user set user_email = #{userEmail}, user_mobile = #{userMobile} where user_id = #{userId}
